reviews.ahmedReview: [AR] Fruit Habibi transformed my business with luxury-grade service. Direct access to international buyers increased my profits by 40%.
reviews.mariaReview: [AR] The quality and reliability of suppliers on this platform is unmatched. It's like dealing with luxury brands.
reviews.omarReview: [AR] Finally, a platform that understands premium Middle Eastern exporters. Game changer for our industry!

hero.readyToGrow: [AR] Ready to grow your business? Manage your listings, connect with buyers, and expand your reach in the global marketplace.
hero.heroDescription: [AR] Fruit Habibi is the B2B marketplace connecting African and Asian farmers with Middle Eastern importers. Trade fresh produce with confidence.

footer.description: [AR] Connecting premium growers with trusted buyers across borders. Building a sustainable future for the global luxury fruits and vegetables trade.
footer.copyright: [AR] © {year} Fruit Habibi – Global Harvest Solutions. All rights reserved.

solutions.globalShippingDesc: [AR] Luxury logistics solutions with gemstone-quality care for your harvest
